data.oai_dc:dc: Reflectance Data _ Peacock Spiders Super Black

Here we report all of the reflectance spectra gathered from the black, red, and blue regions of two species of peacock spiders (Maratus speciosus, Maratus karrie), black reflecance spectra from the normal shiny black spider Cylistella, and black, red, and blue regions of the bird of paradise Dreparnornis bruinjii.
